title: Test Lesson
body:
# Header 1

**BOLD** and __BOLD__

## Header 2

*ITALIC* and _ITALIC_

### Header 3

*__BOLD+ITALIC__* and _**BOLD+ITALIC**_ and __*BOLD+ITALIC*__ and **_BOLD+ITALIC_**

Inline `code` and:

    code
    block

> Blockquote `with code`  
> because why not  
> xd
bodyhtml:
Header 1

code
block

because why not
